page.title: Password forgotten
page.description: Forgot your password? No need to worry. Our password recovery page makes it easy to regain access to your account.
text.main: It seems that you have forgotten your password. An e-mail containing a password reset link will be sent to you. Please enter the email address associated with your account.
input.email.error.wrong-email: No account is registered with this e-mail address
input.email.error.wrong-auth-provider: You are using another authentication provider to log in.
